p: As the study drugs were administrated not only intravenously but also orally throughout the perioperative period, the blinding of the patients, surgeons and anesthesiologists was considered difficult due to the nature of the interventions, so we chose to conduct an open-label trial. However, in order to minimise the risk of bias in the outcome assessments, cancer recurrence will be diagnosed with at least one independent radio-oncologist or pulmonologist. The statistician analysing the results will also be blinded to group allocation.
